* Baking time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
* Prep time: 20 minutes

## Ingredients

* Pasta sauce [@flight2021spaghetti]
* 2 cups cottage cheese
* 1 cup sour cream
* oven ready lasagna noodles
* Bunch of shredded / grated mozzarella cheese
* 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
* 1 cup water

## Directions

* Preheat oven to 350F.
* Combine **2 cups** cottage cheese and **1 cup** sour cream in a bowl.
* Layer:
  * sauce
  * noodles
  * cottage cheese & sour cream
  * mozzarella cheese
  * however many times you need to to fill your dish
  
* Finish with a layer of noodles and cheese.
* Cover dish with foil.
* Put dish on baking sheet, and pour water around the outside of the pan.
* Bake 1 hour.
* Uncover, bake 20 minutes more until bubbly.
